alert.note: Alert for Graham; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 02 at 7:08PM CDT until September 02 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN AND GRAHAM COUNTIES... At 708 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Damar to 10 miles north of Wakeeney to near Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hill City, Morland, Bogue, Nicodemus, Penokee and Saint Peter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
